Others: The New Orleans Pelicans suspended power forward Zion Williamson for their game against Philadelphia for a violation of team policies.
Zion Williamson has been tardy to multiple Pelicans practices or flights, which led to the one-game ban.
Williamson apologized in a statement to team owner Gayle Benson and the entire organization for his behavior.
The Pelicans will play Friday without forward and top defensive player Herb Jones due to a posterior labrum tear in his right shoulder.
